FM Meets New Lao Ambassador 
   Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK, met and had a talk with new Lao Ambassador to the DPRK Chaleune Warinthrasak who paid a courtesy call on him on Thursday.
